offer.name: Head of Tax
offer.descriptionposition:
A well-known international production company is looking for Head of tax.
This is a role for a professional with 8+ years’ experience, primarily with corporate income taxes, corporate income tax compliance and transfer pricing, managerial experience and fluent English.
In this role the primary driver is ensuring tax compliance in the areas of corporate income tax, VAT and transfer pricing for our Russian entities. Risks and opportunities need to be identified, reported and dealt with in a professional manner, and in collaboration with management in Group Tax.
The candidate for this role will be the point of contact between the Company and the Russian tax authorities. An ability to manage the constant enquiries from the authorities while securing the daily tax operation is key. It is expected that the candidate will handle and front all questions and audits from the Russian authorities, fully supported by the local business and Group Tax. At the same time the candidate will be a key business partner for the Russian business, and answer enquiries related to corporate income tax, VAT and transfer pricing.
The role requires an ability to handle multiple stakeholders, maintain a good overview of processes and projects both from a local and group point of view. Building relationships with the team, Group Tax and key stakeholders in the internal Russian organization is essential.
Company offers a great compensation package and benefits.
